Kevin, you were sitting on all these incredible feelings... all tied up in that box with my pictures in desperate need of a love affair. And me... well, I needed to break the Alec habit... and it's only natural I would turn to you in my confusion. But this doesn't feel real. It feels manufactured.Are you kidding? You're a little â¢ miracle.Oh, Alec was the big miracle for a long time... But I think I'd like to try life without any miracles for a while. Kevin realizes how serious Leslie is.I'm not the love of your life.I say.I want to see Forrester Davidson Jr.Well, there must be some mistake. I've come to see Julianna van Patten and they told me she doesn't work here anymore.I'm sorry to bother you here. It's Jules. After she left for work this morning, the finance company came and took away all her furniture, her Jeep, everything they could get their hands on... I couldn't reach her so I finally went over to her office. Alec -- she was fired three weeks ago! All this time, she's been pretending to go to work every day , and pretending to be still having this affair with her boss. And she's been doing a lot of coke .. Well, anyway, I confronted her at the apartment, and at first she denied everything, but then she went crazy -- and now she's locked herself in the apartment and she won't let me back in... I'm really worried about her. Alec hesitates angrily.Alec, please. I need your help.She's in there.Jules, if you don't let us in, we're going to have to call the police. There is a beat and then Jules speaks from the depths of hell.Not my greatest ploy.She just threatened to throw herself out the window. Kevin and Alec have a moment of awkwardness.The fire escape!Jules, you're really scaring me now.Alec, no!!!Alec, stop Iit! She frantically starts climbing the fire escape.Alec!!!Alec, stop it right now! Below them, Billy and Kirbo pull up in a Chevron tow truck. Billy, wearing Chevron coveralls, jumps out with an acetylene torch in hand, shouting.Are you all right? Kirbo tries to get the dolly up the fire escape with Billy.Oh, my God. Jules, please, it's so cold.He's not my lover. Jules, listen...I have never lied to you once since the day I met you... you cocky shithead.Hang on, Jules. We all love you. She has been holding onto the bars with her bare-hands, but the bitter cold makes her wince as she removes her hands. Alec is overwhelmed with feelings as he takes her hands and holds them to his mouth, breathing warm breath onto them. Much emotion passes between them.Your breath, your breath is so sweet.You want some coffee, Ron? Ron enters tentatively and joins them as JULES and BILLY start SHOUTING and LAUGHING LOUDER.Alec, this is soup.This is soup. Alec's nervousness turns to embarrassment as they both start to laugh. Old feelings surge.I love you. They look at each other for a moment.We need time.

KIRBO.raw_line: We're dealing with a first offender here, and since Ms. Beamish doesn't want to press charges, whaddya say we just let this one slide, Officers? They reach the back of the mobile van, where we see BILLY HICKS, a handsome daredevil, playing his saxophone, wearing handcuffs, for two good-looking nurses and Kevin, who is trying to give him black coffee.Dale?... Dale Biberman? She hesitates, somewhat puzzled.You don't remember me.Kirby Kreager. You were a senior when I started Georgetown.And I'm a lawyer. I mean I'm a waiter, studying to be a lawyer... and you became a doctor... Just like you said you would.Dale Biberman. I can't believe it. Do you still like Woody Allen movies? There is a big COMMOTION at the other and of the hail.Madly in love.Did you see her at the hospital? Dale Biberman?It tastes better.Dale Biberman. Kevin looks puzzled as Kirbo hangs up his bike.The girl I fell in love with when we were freshmen. Remember, I met her at that big fountain on main campus? The one that says 'Knowledge, Art, Religion, Life'... she was sitting on the 'Life' side and she smiled at me.... Getting married... becoming a father.And having the right girl smile at you. She has the whitest teeth I've ever seen. "RHAPSODY IN BLUE" fills the room. Kevin begins gathering up his endless pieces of paper, notes, etc.I found her again. It's fate. It's true love. I have her hospital schedule!You're just bitter, 'cause you haven't had sex for a long time.It's the only illusion that counts.Anyone who's ever been in love.Since when do you work on Saturdays?Why, Dale? How nice to see you again.Oh, no... just tying up some legal loose ends for my friends...Buddy, the only extra money I have is my savings for the most important date of my life.I'm ripped between rapture and s torture. sYes. Kreager. One o'clock. I want this table.I'll pay double.Money's no object.Okay and how do you say escargot?Jules, I owe you.Could you please clean up these crumbs, waiter?Aye, aye, sir. Dale Biberman rushes into the restaurant in all her splendor. Kirbo is extremely excited.Ho... that's from Annie Hall, the movie we saw together... don't you remember?Ho... it was Annie Hall.Of course... We'll have the...So... how's your, uh... are you seeing anyone?When? She is gone as the Maitre D' walks over to him with his pad and speaks with exquisite, controlled sarcasm.This is not just an infatuation and she's not just a girl -- she's the only evidence of God I can find on this planet -- with the exception of the mystical force which removes one of my socks from the dryer every time I do laundry. Laundry folded, they head out of the laundromat passing the drop-off "Fluff and Fold" facilities.'Fluff and Fold.' I'm telling you, Kev, when I make it, that's where I take my laundry.I understand 'Fold,' but what is 'Fluff'?Hey, I've been an amateur gynecologist for years. He is gone as Jules and Leslie wave to Billy and start toward the ladies' room.Rejection. Total and devastating. As long as she hasn't rejected me, there's hope.Who are you in love with?I can't help you with your writer's block -- until I see that look in Dale Biberman's eyes. The look that says she knows I'm the one for her.They weren't women. They were practice.I'm going to be a doctor.Why did you tell me you had to work tonight? Why did you lie?I'm obsessed with you, Dale. I have been for four years.I know. But I'm obsessed by my fantasy of you. Dale realizes this man needs some help.I'm your man, Mr. Ho.I don't feel it has any relevancy in the world I want to go into.The 'real' world. Besides, did you know that there are more students in law school than there are practicing lawyers?Hi, Dale.I was hand-picked as special attache to Kim Sung Ho. You know, the famous Korean entrepreneur? He quickly holds up a newspaper with Kim on the cover.I have to grab my huge financial opportunities while-I can. It's all about money, isn't it, Dale?I'm giving a little party Saturday night at Kim's house. I'd really like to see you there.He won't be back until Sunday... remember, there's an extra hundred bucks for you and Kenny to shut up.Fluff and Fold!!!I told him I had Kim's permission. Should I go for the formal'tux, or the velvet smoking jacket, I-do- this -all -the -time look?When she sees me in this setting and realizes my potential, which she has always secretly known about me, the veil will be stripped from her eyes and she will give herself to me tonight.Emergency break in!... Operator! . That's right... What do you mean she won't release the phone??? Did you tell her I'm giving a party for her???Wendy, please, this is the most important thing in my life...Trust me.Where is Dale?What???... Where???Because I'm not responsible for what I'll do to you if you don't.Dear Mr. Iacoccoa... Recently, in a life and death situation, I had the bad luck to use one of your so-called luxury cars... Finally, he sees a large sign reading: "SEVEN SPRINGS."Shit... Goddammitt...Heater. Where's the defroster??? He rams and jams every button and knob in sight as he weaves dangerously on the freeway. Eventually one of the levers comes off in his hand.Dear Mr. Iacoccoa... I recently had the misfortune of using one of your, so-called, new luxury cars in an emergency situation. So much for American enterprise!Kirby Kreager! And who the hell are you? The door swings open and there stands GUY, a handsome thirty-year-old wrapped in a blanket. Dale comes from the bedroom, fastening a man's robe and staring at Kirbo in disbelief.I'll stay in the car.Leave me alone. I'm not your responsibility! Dale has joined them.He's a doctor, isn't he?You expect me to wear his pajamas?I gave up school... and my job at St. Elmo's... and you never even knew about it. It's kind of funny, isn't it? Dale sits down next to him.A kind of win fills his senses.But, Kevin, I used to wait outside her house,. ring the bell and then when she'd come to the window I'd run away. Just to get a glimpse of her.Not Naomi, from our corner?I think you better go to the doctor and get some shots.No, as soon as I get back in school, I'm going to work part- time for a law firm. Did you know there are as many people in law school as there are practicing lawyers?How'd she put the rubber on with her mouth?How is she?I'll find Billy. Kirbo dashes down the fire escape.Billy's working at the big Chevron station on Michigan. He must have a hacksaw or something... Kirbo takes off on his bike as Alec looks at Kevin.Hey! Help. Kevin goes down the fire escape to help him, leaving Alec and Leslie alone. Leslie kneels by the window with her hands on the iron bars and speaks to Jules.Blowtorch, anyone?

KEVIN.raw_line: I wouldn't strike a match near his blood.Severe. She might have finally exceeded the limit on her father's Visa. Billy smiles with relief as the Cops lead him toward their car.It's still sticky.You're welcome. You're welcome. A young, burned-out UNDERGRAD follows.You're not welcome, Clayton. How's school?Like getting slam-dunked against a brick wall, thank you very much.If you tell me the meaning of life?Waiters are like cops. Never around when you need one. Kevin and Alec begin bouncing quarters from the edge of a table into their beers -- obviously some ritual.Never trust a woman who says she isn't angry.Who...?Don't drown him, he's a father. Alec releases Billy who comes up with his hair wet and gives Alec a major shove.Why do they put ice cubes in the urinals?Quick, what's the meaning of life?You took her to one movie! That's not love, it's infatuation! Kirbo searches madly through records strewn on the floor.Killing his roommate for removing Janis Joplin for the soundtrack from Manhattan???If you think I'm going to live through another year of finding poorly written, unmailed love scratchings around this apartment.Love is just an illusion created by lawyer-types like yourself to perpetuate another illusion called marriage to create the reality of divorce and the illusory need for divorce lawyers. Did you know there are more people in law school right now than there are lawyers on the planet?No wonder. The sexual revolution? Who won?Nobody... It used to be that sex was the only free thing in the world. No longer. Palimony, alimony. All financial. Love's an illusion. Finally having gathered up all his notes, Kevin moves toward the bedroom.Says who?Love stinks. He moves into the bedroom, closing the door on Kirbo.Oh, did you move in, too? I only. remember 800 pair of shoes. She opens the elaborate locks and they enter.Very subtle and very pink. Must have cost some subtle bucks.Looks like it could be put together with Leggo blocks. You design this?Maybe you could design a corkscrew that actually works. Everything in this apartment comes from Scandinavia. They don't even have wine in Scandinavia. Naturally Leslie opens it in a flash.Do you think my attachment to Alec is unnatural?Well, since you fell in love with a Democrat and now he's a Republican, I think all bets are off.They are insane. Wives, husbands, children, love, marriage, relationship. It's all insane.I have the perfect cure. Stay away from love. He finds the butter and puts some on her hand.Doesn't Alec hate them?Once, in junior high. I played guitar in a group and fellin love with our singer who did 'We've Only Just Begun' as sweet as Karen Carpenter. I got high on cheap champagne and pledged my love. Next day she ran off with the bass player named Rocky and I traded my guitar in for a battered Underwood typewriter.I can't seem to organize any of my thoughts into anything of any substance.Love stinks. The door opens and Alec arrives home.Rough day with the right wing, dear? Alec hands Leslie a red box. She opens it excitedly and finds a black lace nightgown. She screams as Alec heads for the kitchen.Why, you pregnant? Kidding. What's your 'marriage' hurry?Maybe for you and Leslie. You have the perfect relationship.They're only peppers, Alec.As opposed to tonight's standing violation. You think marriage is going to make you faithful?The idea of two people spending their lives together was invented by people who were lucky to make it to thirty without being eaten by dinosaurs. Marriage is obsolete.Why don't you ever ask me if I want a date?Why would you think I'm gay?Well, just for your information. I happen to be in love with someone but they don't know it. I guess you wouldn't understand loving someone from afar. He takes a swig from a bottle in a paper bag.It's a secret. But I guess you wouldn't understand about that, either.You cannot go to med school just to impress this girl with whom you have a fleeting infatuation.Dreamer.'Fluff' is what I write for the paper. They leave the laundromat. Kirbo drops a sock.What for?Alec, you're going to have to learn to say 'no.'You've seen too many beer commercials. Wendy arrives, nervously, with HOWIE KRANTZ, a plump, cheerful guy, uncomfortable in his preppy clothes.Thought you weren't coming here anymore.Speaking of business acquaintances, you still want my extra key?What would you say the meaning of life is?I don't pay for sex.Food for thought. Food for 'thought. He walks toward his apartment.Not just in Manhattan, Woodman. Kirbo quickly pulls out his camera and snaps a picture of the screen.You can't keep ringing doorbells and running away, calling her and hanging up. What are you afraid of?I have lived with a secret obsession many years myself. However, I realize the other person has no interest in me -- so I pursue my career which is going even more unsuccessfully.I don't have to share everything with you...You'll go fluff and fold, someday. Whereas I will still be writing obits. I can't even come up with a decent piece for the paper to show my editor.Kirbo, what about all the other women you were going out with?You'll never catch me making a fool ofmyself over a beautiful woman. I know what they're really made of. Watch this.The defense rests. They disappear into their building.Does Alec know you're doing this?You've left school, put yourself into debt, lied to Alec who got you this job in the first place -- and all for a woman who doesn't seem to be interested in you.Well, excuse me, buckeroo. But I think you're a fool.holds court for the undergrads.The best advice I can give you undergrads is to fail. Failure is a virtue in today's society. Human error is a badge of honor. If you're the alcoholic child of a celebrity, you can blame them and earn a year on the best-seller list. If you're a celebrity, your mistake will earn you a People magazine cover. It's post- Watergate morality. Take responsibility for your mistakes and make a quick buck while you're at it.It's still the same. Small and ugly... but then again it's small and ugly. Are you sure we shouldn't find you some nice lady-like hotel?That's not how you're supposed to ask. You're supposed to be a young lady who is very impressed with. my mind. Having come from a deep Hungarian film and getting cozy over a brandy, she says... 'Is that... a coffin...?' And, then I say, 'Yes, it's my coffin' . 'Your coffin,' she would gasp, her interest in me growing by leaps and bounds. Then'I would sit back stroking her arm and say 'Yes, I figured we're going to spend a long time in the ground together so I've made friends with it... I've gotten drunk on it... rolled joints on it . Even made love on it many times!' It's a prop for affect.How would I know?No, that's more effect. He opens a straw box, obviously filled with his most personal possessions and extricates a photograph of a very ordinary family.You remember my family.Except you're the first woman I've ever been able to get up here. And I've blown all my props already... So how about some brandy? Kevin searches for clean glasses in the debris that passes for a kitchen, Leslie finds photos and political cartoons in his straw box. Eventually, she finds a photo of herself, and then another -- followed by dozens more. Kevin has an entire homage to her in his secret stash. He comes back with the brandy to find her looking at the photos.Alec had the luck of geography. Whatever we say about Alec we'll regret tomorrow.Oooo -- dangerous question.And I think the reason I'm not interested in other women... is 'cause I...Leslie, we won't even remember this tomorrow.I love you... I've always loved you. They kiss madly, passionately. They fall to the floor in a frenzy. Leslie pulls Kevin's hair.Aaaaah. Ouch... No. I love it. I love it!!! Leslie grabs onto the large throw rug as they roll around the floor. Somehow as they roll and turn, the rug gets wrapped around them. Leslie tears at his shirt, as he yanks her sweater off. Kevin fights madly with the back of Leslie's bra. He is going berserk trying to find the clasp.Kirbo?No.Ah... I kind of have company.Alec...Alec, I'll call you later. Alec capitulates and leaves the apartment. Kevin relaxes just as Alec pops back in.I know that if we fight, you're going to win. But I'm warning you, I will use every bone in my body, every lamp in this room to make sure I inflict as much damage as possible on you before you bring me down. Kevin prepares for the fight.I'm sure I'll be back doing obits tomorrow.Sort of. Leslie, I couldn't write anything of any meaning until you. He kisses her warmly.Since the day I met her. They look out of the window.Who's that?Speaking of which... As she closes the window, Kevin attacks her again.Me, too, and I don't like to count my cornish hens before they hatch, but I do think I'll be getting a raise. And I was thinking we could get a place together.I know it's fast. But I also know I love you.What?It's me, isn't it?But not a big miracle like Alec.Well, having your first byline, and losing the love of your life in the same night has a certain 'The Gods must be laughing at me' feeling.Who says?But you're a girl, what do you know? Leslie embraces him with deep friendship.I've had second thoughts. Intimacy is dangerous and shattering... but ultimately necessary.The night Leslie gave me the kiss- off, I fucked a black hooker three times.Naomi from our corner.I used a rubber. She put it on me with her mouth.Forever got a lot shorter suddenly. They move on, passing a sign on the door: "WAITER WARTED." Kevin points to it.Sounds familiar.The whole country is.falling apart, but these five bars are made perfectly.Or an experienced thief.I was kidding.He needed the money. Suddenly, Alec and Kevin become aware that they are alone.Yeah, well, yesterday's editorial achievement is today's garbage wrapper, right...? Kevin tries to laugh charmingly. Alec tries to laugh along with him, but suddenly rage returns.My notes!(upside-down,I feel I've done a lot for you, too, Al... so pull me up and we'll call it even.You think this is helping Jules? With Kevin's life still in his hands, he suddenly remembers Jules.Do not hand him a blowtorch! Kevin takes the torch and goes for the bars. SPARKS and fire fly. Suddenly there is a PHENOMENAL POUNDING from inside the apartment at Jules' front door. It stops everyone on the fire escape.
